The '''Moderator Cape''' is a [[cape]] given to moderators on Mojira, the [[Bug tracker|Mojang Bug Tracker]].

== Distribution ==
This cape is given to current and past moderators on Mojira. To become a moderator, a community member needs to be consistently active in assisting in the bug tracker's moderation, and become a Mojira helper first.

== History ==
{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine||December 25, 2014|link=none|The cape is given to current Mojira moderators.}}
|{{HistoryLine||May 9, 2016|link=none|The cape is now given to all Mojira moderators from now.}}
}}
